articles.title: Magazine Marking WPK Founding Anniversary Issued in Thailand
articles.content:
Magazine Marking WPK Founding Anniversary Issued in Thailand 
    Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) -- The magazine "Warm Congratulations on 59th Founding Anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea" was published by the Organization for the Study of the Juche Idea of Thailand on the occasion of the anniversary.
 The magazine carries articles and photos introducing the Juche idea and Korea.    
 It also informs the readers of recent activities of the organization.

Nepali Prime Minister Supports Cause of Korean People
articles.content:
Nepali Prime Minister Supports Cause of Korean People 
    Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) -- Sher Bahadur Deuba, Nepali prime minister and chairman of the Nepali Congress (Democratic), hoped that the Korean people would record good results in the efforts to build socialism and achieve the country's reunification under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il when he met with the DPRK ambassador to Nepal on a courtesy call on him on October 5.
 On behalf of the Nepalese government he sincerely wished  Kim Jong Il, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, good health and greater success in his noble work of leading the WPK and the Korean people.

Kim Yong Nam Greets Equatorial Guinean President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Equatorial Guinean President
    Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, sent a message of greetings to Equatorial Guinean President Obiang Nguema Mbasogo Monday on the occasion of the 36th anniversary of its independence.
 Expressing the belief that the good friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would further develop in various fields, the message sincerely wished the president greater success in his noble work for the stability and prosperity of the country.
